text:
P.S. In view of the new home based business regulations, we regret to inform you that the delivery date for this order will be shifted to the 17th of May.
 Delivery cost will still be discounted at $5 per bouquet. The flowers will be left at your doorstep and a confirmation text message will be sent once delivered.
Full refunds have been processed for clients who would prefer to withdraw their orders that were originally meant for Mother’s Day. Sorry for the inconvenience and Thank you so much for supporting our art!
